spec_data.Name: perl-Plack
spec_data.Description:
Plack is a set of tools for using the PSGI stack. It contains middleware
components, a reference server and utilities for Web application
frameworks. Plack is like Ruby's Rack or Python's Paste for WSGI.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:18:35 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl Superglue for Web frameworks and Web Servers (PSGI toolkit)
